title: BSA Celebrates a Successful PhD Defense
summary: Our community congratulates one of our doctoral members on a successful dissertation defense at UTSA.
content: The BSA@UTSA community gathered to celebrate a major academic milestone. Members shared mentorship stories, research insights, and guidance for incoming graduate students.
author: BSA Media Team

seo.title: UTSA PhD Defense Celebration | BSA@UTSA
seo.description: BSA@UTSA celebrates a successful PhD defense with faculty and students.

title: Member Lands Data Science Role
summary: A BSA member accepted a data science role after completing their UTSA program.
content: BSA continues to support career growth through peer coaching, resume circles, and referral networks. This latest placement reflects our members' preparation and collaboration.
author: BSA Career Committee

seo.title: BSA Member Career Success | BSA@UTSA
seo.description: BSA member secures a new data science role after graduating from UTSA.
